# Kamioi - AI-Powered Automatic Investing Platform

## About
Kamioi is an AI-powered micro-investing fintech platform that turns everyday purchases into stock ownership through automatic round-up investing. Users connect their bank account, and every purchase is rounded up to the nearest dollar with the spare change automatically invested in fractional shares.

## Key Features
- Automatic round-up investing from everyday purchases
- AI-powered stock matching and portfolio optimization
- Fractional share purchases starting from $1
- Real-time portfolio tracking and performance analytics
- Family investing with shared dashboards (up to 5 members)
- Business plans for teams and investment clubs (up to 20 users)
- Bank-level 256-bit encryption and SIPC insurance
- Two-factor authentication for account security

## Plans & Pricing
- Individual Plan: $9/month - Personal automatic investing
- Family Plan: $19/month - Up to 5 family members
- Business Plan: $49/month - Up to 20 users with admin controls
- All plans include unlimited automatic investments, no trading fees
